q.quote: In war the heroes always outnumber the soldiers ten to one.
q.author: H. L. Mencken

q.quote: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
q.author: Yoko Ono

q.quote: Trees and plants always look like the people they live with, somehow.
q.author: H. L. Mencken

q.quote: If you want to see the true measure of a man, watch how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
q.author: J. K. Rowling

q.quote: Science is not only a disciple of reason but, also, one of romance and passion.
q.author: Stephen Hawking

q.quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
q.author: Audrey Hepburn

q.quote: We were old sinners - but when we came to Christ we are not sinners anymore.
q.author: Joel Osteen

q.quote: If you want to see the true measure of a man, watch how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
q.author: J. K. Rowling

q.quote: Democracy is when the indigent, and not the men of property, are the rulers.
q.author: Aristotle

q.quote: Christmas, my child, is love in action. Every time we love, every time we give, it's Christmas.
q.author: J. K. Rowling

q.quote: The art of communication is the language of leadership.
q.author: James Humes

q.quote: Youth comes but once in a lifetime.
q.author: James Humes

q.quote: Follow your dreams, believe in yourself and don't give up.
q.author: J. K. Rowling

q.quote: The art of communication is the language of leadership.
q.author: James Humes

q.quote: The jealous are troublesome to others, but a torment to themselves.
q.author: William Penn
